messages.text: Hello, this is Emma from City Pharma. I'm calling to inquire about your latest product catalog, specifically any new cardiovascular medications you might have available.
Hello Emma, nice to hear from you. Yes, we do have several new cardiovascular products. We recently added a new blood pressure medication called CardioGuard Plus. Would you like information on that?
Yes, that sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about CardioGuard Plus? What are the specifications and pricing?

CardioGuard Plus comes in 10mg and 20mg tablets, available in boxes of 30 or 90 tablets. It's a combination medication that helps manage both blood pressure and cholesterol. The pricing starts at 45 euros for a 30-tablet box.
That's very helpful. Do you have any clinical studies or documentation we could review? Also, what's the minimum order quantity?

Yes, we can provide full documentation including clinical studies and safety data. The minimum order is 10 boxes, and we offer volume discounts for orders over 50 boxes. I can email you the complete product information package if you'd like.
That would be excellent. Please send the documentation to our procurement email. Are there any other new products in your cardiovascular line we should know about?
We also have a new anticoagulant called FlowGuard that was just approved last month. It's available in 5mg and 10mg doses. I can include information about that in the package as well.
Perfect, please include both products in the documentation. We'll review everything and get back to you within the week. Thank you so much for your time.
You're very welcome, Emma. I'll send the information package today. Feel free to call if you have any questions. Goodbye!
